title: Alpha Molly
description: As a Web Design & Build Intern, I helped a start-up rebuild their website from scratch within a small team. I developed the Company pages and footer in React with Next.js, ensured full responsiveness, integrated Sanity for dynamic content, and deployed the site to Vercel via GitHub.

title: Consenz
description: As a Front-End Developer Intern, I collaborated with the CEO and UX designer to redesign all web pages using Figma, then built the redesigned pages on Shopify. I ensured responsive, interactive layouts and implemented subscription forms via MailChimp and HubSpot.

title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
description: A fun, browser-based Rock, Paper, Scissors game where you face off against the computer. Built with HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript (ES6), the game features interactive buttons, dynamic score tracking, and instant result feedback â€” all in a clean, responsive layout.

title: Weather App
description: View the current and forecasted weather for any location using API data. The app was built using a combination of JQuery, Bootstrap, moment.js and CSS as well as localStorage for the 'Search History' feature.

title: Code Quiz
description: A quiz game to test your knowledge on coding! This quiz was built using Javascript and incorporates a countdown timer feature as well as the use of localStorage for the ability to save scores for a leaderboard.

title: Find My Artist
description: A collaborative project, this was built using the Spotify API and a QR code API, allowing users to search any artist to display their top tracks. The QR code displays further information about the searched artist, whilst localStorage allows for the ability to save the users search history.

title: Password Generator
description: Using Javascript, this app uses data taken from user input to generate a password based upon the chosen preferences.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: Built using JQuery and moment.js, this app allows users to organise their day by saving their tasks so they can be referred back to as and when needed. To keep track of time of day, the current hour is highlighted in red, future hours in green and any past hours in grey.

title: Team Profile Generator
description: Build a team portal to quickly access your colleagues contact info! Using Node.js and the Inquirer package, this app displays a series of prompts for the user to add team members. Once complete, a html file is generated displaying all the data provided using Object-Oriented Programming.
